name: Tailwind CSS
description: (Awesome List) - A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs.

name: Alpine.js
description: (Awesome List) - A rugged, minimal framework for composing JavaScript behavior in your markup.

name: Livewire
description: (Awesome List) - A full-stack framework for Laravel that takes the pain out of building dynamic UIs.

name: Laravel
description: (Awesome List) - A PHP web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax.

name: talltips
description: Collection of tips and ideas across the TALL stack.

name: Alptail
description: A collection of open-source UI components, using Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js.

name: Blade Icons
description: A package to easily make use of SVG icons in your Laravel Blade views.

name: Blade Script
description: A package to easily add transpiled & minified scripts to your Blade components.

name: Blade Style
description: A package to easily minify styles and make use of sass, less, etc. in your Blade components.

name: Blade UI Kit
description: A set of renderless components to utilise in your Laravel Blade views.

name: Docdress
description: A package to create markdown documentations from GitHub repositories in a Laravel-like design.

name: Filament
description: The elegant TALL stack admin panel for Laravel artisans.

name: Laravel Form Components
description: A set of Blade components to rapidly build forms with Tailwind CSS Custom Forms and Bootstrap 4.

name: Laravel TALL Preset
description: A front-end preset for Laravel to scaffold an application using the TALL stack.

name: Laravel TALL Preset
description: A preset for installing the TALL stack with just one command.

name: Laravel TTALL Preset
description: A preset for Turbolinks + TALL stack, bundled with some helpful packages and their configurations.

name: Laravel Views
description: Laravel package to create beautiful common views like data tables using the TALL stack.

name: Livewire Datatables
description: Package to create tables with sorting, filtering, searching, exporting etc.

name: Tailwind UI
description: Beautiful UI components built with Tailwind CSS. Offers Alpine.js integration.

name: TALL Forms
description: A dynamic, responsive Laravel Livewire form component with realtime validation, file uploads, array fields, blade form input components and more.

name: X Blade Components
description: Ready-to-use Blade components.
